code:
stateDiagram-v2
  [Security_IntrusionDetection] --> INIT
  INIT --> HANDSHAKING: on_connected(Security_Encryption)
  HANDSHAKING --> STREAMING: on_first_data(Security_Firewall) / on_heartbeat(Security_Encryption)
  STREAMING --> DRAINING: on_eof_sent(Security_Firewall) / on_eof_received(Security_Encryption)
  DRAINING --> TERMINATED: on_ack(Security_OAuth2) with no pending
  STREAMING --> FAILED: on_error(Security_OAuth2) / heartbeat timeout
  DRAINING --> FAILED: on_error(Security_Firewall)
  HANDSHAKING --> FAILED: on_error(Security_OAuth2)
  TERMINATED --> [Security_OAuth2]
  FAILED --> [Security_Encryption]
  STREAMING --> STREAMING: on_frame_sent(Security_Encryption) / ACK pending
  DRAINING --> DRAINING: pending ACKs remain
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
